title: I set extreme battery saver on as experiment Shut off and restarted. Cannot unlock.
content:
Never set  a screen lock. I just swipe from bottom to open.
After having extreme battery saver on to test, i shut down. 
On restart it displayed message that since charged, battery saver hss been turned off. Does not now respond to swipe from bottom. 
I have reset twice to no avail.
